backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles and quiz storage with query and update methods for profiles and questions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing styling, components, hooks, quiz logic, and utilities.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment config showing translation API URL and how to provide backend canister IDs via build-time or runtime env.json.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS theme with cyber‑bunker OKLCH colors, dark mode variables, and mobile safe-area handling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry with pre-bootstrap script loading env.json into window.__ENV__ and starting the React app.
frontend/public/env.json: Runtime environment file containing an empty CANISTER_ID_BACKEND placeholder.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, profile loading, quiz flow state, diagnostics, build info, and stopped-canister detection.
frontend/src/components/BuildIdentityFoo: Footer component showing build version, timestamp, and deployment ID from buildStamp.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentDiagno: Diagnostics panel component that displays errors, health checks, runtime environment info, and publishing tools with auto-refresh and actions.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: User onboarding form to save a display name via backend mutation.
frontend/src/config/index.ts: Creates configured backend actors, loads IDL dynamically, and exposes connection info utilities.
frontend/src/config/translation.ts: Translation helper using a configurable API endpoint with a MyMemory fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that initializes and caches a backend actor based on identity and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackupRestore.ts: Hook for exporting and restoring full backend state with JSON serialization and validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useExportAllQuestions: Hook to export all quizzes, questions, and block names while logging and continuing on errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity provider and hook managing login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePressHold.ts: Provides a hook that tracks press-and-hold interactions across pointer and keyboard events and returns pressed state with handlers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps React Query calls for fetching and mutating quiz data via an actor, including profiles, quizzes, counts, and questions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuestionTranslatio: Manages text translation with caching, deduped requests, error handling, and translation state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuizRecovery.ts: Provides a function to copy questions from one quiz to another with status and error tracking, invalidating relevant queries.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/quiz/adaptiveScheduler.ts: Implements an adaptive question scheduler with randomized first pass, repeat logic, mastery tracking, and spacing rules.
frontend/src/quiz/BackupRestorePanel.tsx: UI panel for exporting quiz data to a JSON file and restoring from a selected backup with confirmation and status handling.
frontend/src/quiz/blockUtils.ts: Provides utilities for dividing questions into 100-question blocks and generating labels and ranges.
frontend/src/quiz/draftStorage.ts: Manages saving, loading, and clearing quiz drafts in localStorage with versioning and serialization utilities.
frontend/src/quiz/imageUtils.ts: Utilities for validating JPEG files, converting files to blobs, generating preview URLs, and creating ExternalBlob objects.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/PdfImportPre: Empty placeholder file for PDF import preview component.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/pdfImportTyp: Empty placeholder for PDF import type definitions.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/pdfTextExtra: Empty placeholder for PDF text extraction logic.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/questionExtr: Empty placeholder for parsing extracted PDF text into questions.
frontend/src/quiz/PreGameQuestionCountVi: UI for selecting a question count before starting a quiz, with loading, validation, and slider controls.
frontend/src/quiz/PreQuizSummaryView.tsx: Displays a summary of selected quiz settings and validates question counts before the quiz starts.
frontend/src/quiz/QuestionImagePicker.ts: Image upload component for questions, handling JPEG validation, progress, preview, and removal.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizEditor.tsx: Main quiz editor managing question editing, recovery, export, validation, and image attachments.
frontend/src/quiz/quizFlowDiagnostics.ts: Provides optional diagnostics logging for quiz flow transitions and actions, toggleable via localStorage.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizGameplay.tsx: Runs quiz gameplay flow including block selection, question selection, adaptive scheduling, answering, and translation.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizResults.tsx: Displays quiz completion results with score breakdown and actions to replay or review wrong answers.
frontend/src/quiz/randomSubset.ts: Creates randomized subsets of question indices using Fisher-Yates shuffling.
frontend/src/quiz/sessionTypes.ts: Defines performance and session state types for quiz tracking.
frontend/src/quiz/TroubleshootingPanel.t: Panel showing quiz data diagnostics like quiz list, question counts, and warnings for empty quizzes.
frontend/src/quiz/types.ts: Re-exports Question and QuizId types from the backend.
frontend/src/quiz/validation.ts: Validates quiz questions, ensuring required content, answer rules, and correct answer selection.
frontend/src/quiz/WrongAnswersReview.tsx: Shows a scrollable list of incorrectly answered questions with a back action and Escape key support.
frontend/src/quiz/wrongAnswerTypes.ts: Defines types for tracking wrong-answer review entries.
frontend/src/types/env.d.ts: Type definitions for environment variables and window-level injected config.
frontend/src/utils/actorConnectionInfo.t: Resolves backend connection info including host, canister ID, network, and resolution metadata.
frontend/src/utils/buildStamp.ts: Generates build metadata including timestamp, version, environment, and a stable deployment ID.
Resolves backend canister ID from multiple sources with detailed source tracking and error reporting.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentDiagnostics: Collects, stores, and formats deployment-related errors with metadata and provides a formatted diagnostics report.
frontend/src/utils/formatPublishChecklis: Generates a plain-text checklist containing build info, canister resolution details, and publishing steps for deployment.
frontend/src/utils/liveReadiness.ts: Evaluates whether the app is ready for live use based on canister ID resolution and backend health check results.
frontend/src/utils/quizExport.ts: Provides helpers for exporting quiz data to JSON, generating filenames, and triggering browser downloads.
Performs a hard refresh by clearing storage, unregistering service workers, clearing caches, and reloading with cache-busting.
frontend/src/utils/runtimeEnvStatus.ts: Inspects runtime env.json loading and CANISTER_ID_BACKEND presence and returns troubleshooting guidance.
frontend/src/utils/shareLiveVerification: Formats a plain-text summary of build, canister, and health check info for live verification sharing.
frontend/src/utils/stateSnapshotJson.ts: Handles JSON-safe serialization and deserialization of full state snapshots, including ExternalBlob URL handling and validation.
frontend/src/utils/stoppedCanisterDetect: Parses errors to detect IC0508 stopped-canister rejections, extract canister IDs, and provide messages and recovery steps.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, shadows, and utilities, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, features, and pending requests for build/version accuracy and live deployment readiness.
